ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] pictures
ygData.msgSnippet: I also get my message through email, so how the actual group page looks won t make a whole lot of difference to me.  In fact, I can t remember the last time I
ygData.messageBody:
I also get my message through email, so how the actual group page looks
won't make a whole lot of difference to me. In fact, I can't remember
the last time I visited the page, lol

Wulfric Rennison wrote:

> Since I receive posts via email, I don't normally tend to go to the
> website much. So a picture wouldn't make much difference to me.
> However, why not just take a stock logo of EverQuest, run it through
> Photoshop and add "@yahoogroups.com" to it? It's not like there's one
> particular picture that's going to summarize the essence of what this
> group is all about.
>
> But it's "ur list" so do what you want with the picture!
>
> Wulfric
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> *From:* Su <mailto:suceress@...>
> *To:* EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> *Sent:* Sunday, June 12, 2005 6:13 AM
> *Subject:* Re: Re: [EverQuest] pictures
>
> If I can find one. And can you pretty please not use "ur". It's my
> pet peeve.
> Anyone know where I can find a good picture for the group? Or any
> suggestions?
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
